title: Alla vi barn i Bullerbyn
overview: Swedish TV-series based on the books by Astrid Lindgren, recorded in 1960. Produced by the network Sveriges Radio-TV, which today correspond to the network SVT1. Before the series aired on TV in 1962, it was re-edited into two movies, where episodes 3,4 and 5 became "Alla vi barn i Bullerbyn" (1960) and shortened versions of episodes 8, 9, 10, 11 and 12 became "Bara roligt i Bullerbyn" (1961).
